description: Single storey rear and side extension; alteration of roof from hip to gable end; rear roof extension;  installation of four rooflights to front roofslope and external alterations ( reinstating Oriel window) (following demolition existing carport, garage,  rear extension and front porch)
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing number:- 2401/PL01 Rev. B
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing dwellinghouse, and shall be consistent with those as listed within the submitted application form, Section 11 and the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies 7.4 & 7.6 of The London Plan ((2016) and Policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), polices 1.1 (k) and 1.2 (f) of the adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2013)

| Prior to the development hereby permitted being first occupied, the window proposed to be located on the side elevation facing no.6 Carbery Avenue shall be glazed with obscured glass, and this glazing shall be maintained for the life of the development unless alternative arrangements are approved in writing by the local planning authority as per approved plans, Condition 2.

Reason: To safeguard the amenities and privacy of the occupiers of adjoining properties, in accordance with Section 7- Requiring good design of the National Planning Policy Framework, policy 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan 2013, policy 1.1 (g) of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy 2012 and policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan 2016
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.
Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan 2013.
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.
Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan 2013.
